description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派（黄教）转世传承的领袖头衔。
description.en: The title for the spiritual leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教的一个派别，由宗喀巴在15世纪创立。
description.en: A school of Tibetan Buddhism founded by Je Tsongkhapa in the 15th century.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古土默特部首领，他给予了第三世达赖喇嘛“达赖喇嘛”的尊号。
description.en: Leader of the Tümed Mongols who bestowed the title 'Dalai Lama' upon the 3rd Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第三世达赖喇嘛，是第一位被授予“达赖喇嘛”称号的转世活佛。
description.en: The 3rd Dalai Lama, the first to be given the title 'Dalai Lama'.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的创始人。
description.en: The founder of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 宗喀巴的弟子，被追认为第一世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: A disciple of Tsongkhapa, posthumously recognized as the 1st Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第四世达赖喇嘛，俺答汗的孙子，是唯一一位蒙古人出任的达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 4th Dalai Lama, grandson of Altan Khan, and the only Mongol to hold the title.

description.zh-cn: 现任的第十四世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The current and 14th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第五世达赖喇嘛，建立了甘丹颇章政权。
description.en: The 5th Dalai Lama, who established the Ganden Phodrang government.

description.zh-cn: 由第五世达赖喇嘛建立的西藏政府，由达赖喇嘛主持。
description.en: The government of Tibet established by the 5th Dalai Lama and presided over by the Dalai Lamas.

description.zh-cn: 一个卫拉特蒙古汗国，曾在一段时间内影响西藏政治。
description.en: An Oirat Mongol khanate that influenced Tibetan politics for a period.

description.zh-cn: 中国最后一个帝制王朝，曾在一段时间内影响西藏政治。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, which influenced Tibetan politics for a period.

description.zh-cn: 1912年西藏将清朝官兵驱逐出藏的事件，此后西藏获得事实上的独立。
description.en: The 1912 event where Tibet expelled Qing officials and troops, after which Tibet achieved de facto independence.

description.zh-cn: 第十三世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 13th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 一种描述世俗统治者（施主）与宗教领袖（福田）之间相互依存关系的政治与宗教概念。
description.en: A political and religious concept describing the interdependent relationship between a secular ruler (patron) and a spiritual leader (priest).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政当局。
description.en: The governing authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教中寻找和认定活佛继承人的制度和方法。
description.en: The system and method of finding and identifying the successors of living Buddhas in Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 第六世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 6th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 由清朝与和硕特汗国政府认定并册立的另一位第六世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: Another 6th Dalai Lama, recognized and enthroned by the Qing court and the Khoshut Khanate.

nodes.id: 达赖喇嘛甘丹颇章基金会

zh-cn: 达赖喇嘛甘丹颇章基金会

description.zh-cn: 由第十四世达赖喇嘛指定的唯一有权认定其转世灵童的机构。
description.en: The foundation designated by the 14th Dalai Lama as the sole authority to recognize his reincarnation.

description.zh-cn: 第二世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 2nd Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第七世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 7th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第八世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 8th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第九世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 9th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第十世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 10th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第十一世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 11th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 第十二世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The 12th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 达赖喇嘛是藏传佛教格鲁派的领袖。
description.en: The Dalai Lama is the leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古土默特部首领俺答汗给予第三世达赖喇嘛索南嘉措“达赖喇嘛”的尊号。
description.en: Altan Khan, leader of the Tümed Mongols, gave the title 'Dalai Lama' to the 3rd Dalai Lama, Sonam Gyatso.

description.zh-cn: 根敦朱巴是格鲁派创始人宗喀巴的弟子。
description.en: Gendun Drup was a disciple of Tsongkhapa, the founder of the Gelug school.

description.zh-cn: 第四世达赖喇嘛云丹嘉措是俺答汗的孙子。
description.en: The 4th Dalai Lama, Yonten Gyatso, was the grandson of Altan Khan.

description.zh-cn: 从1642年（第五世达赖喇嘛）到1959年期间，达赖喇嘛在甘丹颇章主持西藏政府。
description.en: From 1642 (during the time of the 5th Dalai Lama) to 1959, the Dalai Lama presided over the Tibetan government at the Ganden Phodrang.

description.zh-cn: 达赖喇嘛的统治受到和硕特汗国的影响。
description.en: The rule of the Dalai Lama was influenced by the Khoshut Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 达赖喇嘛的统治受到大清帝国的影响。
description.en: The rule of the Dalai Lama was influenced by the Qing Empire.

description.zh-cn: 1912年，西藏将清朝官兵驱逐出藏，结束了清朝在西藏的统治影响。
description.en: In 1912, Tibet expelled Qing officials and troops, ending the Qing's ruling influence in Tibet.

description.zh-cn: 第十三世达赖喇嘛宣布西藏与中国的关系为“檀越关系”。
description.en: The 13th Dalai Lama declared the relationship between Tibet and China to be a 'Patron and priest relationship'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府声称丹增嘉措无权单方面决定其转世事宜，转世必须经过中央政府批准，以此干涉其宗教权力。
description.en: The government of the People's Republic of China claims that Tenzin Gyatso has no right to unilaterally decide on his reincarnation, stating that it must be approved by the central government, thereby interfering with his religious authority.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与和硕特汗国政府共同认定并册立阿旺伊西嘉措为第六世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The Qing court and the Khoshut Khanate jointly recognized and enthroned Ngawang Yeshey Gyatso as the 6th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与和硕特汗国政府共同认定并册立阿旺伊西嘉措为第六世达赖喇嘛。
description.en: The Qing court and the Khoshut Khanate jointly recognized and enthroned Ngawang Yeshey Gyatso as the 6th Dalai Lama.

relationships.target: 达赖喇嘛甘丹颇章基金会

description.zh-cn: 第十四世达赖喇嘛指定“达赖喇嘛甘丹颇章基金会”为唯一有权认定其转世灵童的机构。
description.en: The 14th Dalai Lama designated the 'Dalai Lama Ganden Phodrang Foundation' as the sole authority with the right to identify his reincarnation.

description.zh-cn: 由清朝与和硕特汗国政府认定并册立，与仓央嘉措并立。
description.en: Recognized and enthroned by the Qing court and the Khoshut Khanate, coexisting with Tsangyang Gyatso.
